name: Don't Panic (Mauricio Miranda)
description:
You find yourself in an unknown environment. A voice calls out to you and informs you that you have five minutes left to live. The only thing you can do in order to survive is escape.

Make your way through five different rooms before time runs out. Pick up and move objects, interact with different interfaces, and solve puzzles in order to escape.

Developed in Unity using C#. 

https://github.com/MauricioMirandaDev/DontPanic
